media:group.media:title: â€œThe Cost of Restâ€ | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 4 Q3 2021
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2021 quarter 3, lesson 4 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is â€œRest in Christâ€ and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled â€œThe Cost of Restâ€. Join us every week for a fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
2 Sam. 11:1â€“27, 2 Sam. 12:1â€“ 23, Gen. 3:1â€“8, 1 John 1:9
Memory Text: â€œCreate in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a steadfast spirit within meâ€ (Ps. 51:10, NKJV).
(July 17â€“July 23)
Sunday (Ryan Day) - â€œWorn and Wearyâ€ Monday (John Lomacang) - â€œWake-up Callâ€ Tuesday (Shelley Quinn) - â€œForgiven and Forgottenâ€ Wednesday (Jill Morikone) - â€œSomething Newâ€ Thursday (Kenny Shelton) - â€œReflectors of God's Lightâ€

media:group.media:description:
John & Angela Lomacang invite you to join them along with their guests from Adventist World Aviation. Hear from Bruce Wilkerson, Executive Vice President of AWA; Josh Fix, Future Pilot and Mechanic of AWA Nicaragua; and Yosiday Fix, Humanitarian Worker of AWA. Learn more: https://flyawa.org/

entry.title: Iceberg | Preparing Our People Regarding Their Error (Sermon)

media:group.media:title: Iceberg | Preparing Our People Regarding Their Error (Sermon)
media:group.media:description:
In this sermon produced by 3ABN, Pastor Kenny Shelton will share from the Bible how errors are coming into the church and how we should prepare to meet this "iceberg". These doctrinal errors of lukewarm Christianity are just one warning sign we are living in the last days. The time is now to meet the challenge, get the word out and be obedient to God's Word.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
